item.title: 以色列初创企业获得加沙战争以来罕见的阿联酋投资
item.description: 一家开发实验室培育牛奶的以色列初创公司从阿拉伯联合酋长国的一家基金筹集到 2000 万美元，这是自以色列与哈马斯开战以来，波斯湾地区对以色列的罕见投资。【原文：An Israeli startup developing lab-grown milk raised $20 million from a fund in the United Arab Emirates, marking a rare investment from the Persian Gulf into Israel since the start of its war with Hamas.】

item.title: 民意调查显示，南非支持在预算中实现 3% 的消费物价指数目标
item.description: 据一项调查显示，南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）预计将在本周批准 3% 的通胀目标，从而使财政政策与中央银行推动将物价锚定在这一水平的努力保持一致。【原文：South Africa’s Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana is expected to endorse a 3% inflation target this week, aligning fiscal policy with the central bank’s push to anchor prices at that level, according to a survey.】

item.title: 里夫斯最强烈地暗示了英国的增税计划
item.description: 蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）表示，工党可能准备违背其不加税的竞选承诺，因为她认为英国的预算将是 "困难的"。【原文：Rachel Reeves indicated the Labour Party may be preparing to break its election promises not to raise taxes, as she looks ahead to what she called a “difficult” UK budget.】

item.title: OpenBrand CPI 数据显示美国 10 月消费品通胀放缓
item.description: OpenBrand 价格数据显示，10 月份美国耐用消费品和个人用品通胀率三个月来首次出现减速，反映出商家打折力度略有回升。【原文：US consumer durables and personal goods inflation decelerated in October for the first time in three months, reflecting a slight pickup in the degree of merchant discounting, according to OpenBrand price data.】

item.title: 美联储主席穆萨莱姆认为美国第一季度经济将反弹
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆说，他预计美国经济将在明年初强劲反弹，这强调了官员们需要谨慎对待进一步降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said he expects the US economy to bounce back strongly early next year, underscoring the need for officials to approach additional interest-rate cuts with caution.】

item.title: 芯片、航空股因关门乐观情绪引领美国股市反弹
item.description: 美国股市周一反弹，投资者对立法者即将达成协议结束史上最长的政府关门表示乐观。【原文：US stocks rallied Monday as investors expressed optimism that lawmakers were nearing a deal to end the longest government shutdown in history.】

item.title: 瑞士为欧盟协议赢得地平线欧洲协议
item.description: 在周一签署了一项协议之后，瑞士将重新加入包括地平线欧洲（Horizon Europe）在内的欧盟相关项目名册，该协议可能会释放来自欧盟的一大波研究资金。【原文：Switzerland will rejoin a roster of European Union-related programs including Horizon Europe after a deal signed on Monday that could unlock a wave of research funding from the bloc.】

item.title: 贝莱德面临私人贷款 100%亏损的危机
item.description: 大约一个月前，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc）认为，它向陷入困境的家装公司 Renovo Home Partners 提供的私人债务价值 100 美分。截至上周，该公司有了新的评估：零。【原文：About a month ago, BlackRock Inc. deemed the private debt it had extended to Renovo Home Partners, a struggling home improvement company, to be worth 100 cents on the dollar. As of last week, the firm had a new assessment: zero.】

item.title: 英国超过南非成为津巴布韦第一大汇款来源国
item.description: 据津巴布韦财政部长姆图利-恩库比（Mthuli Ncube）称，英国有望成为今年津巴布韦最大的汇款来源国，首次超过南非。【原文：The UK is expected to be the largest source of remittances to Zimbabwe this year, overtaking South Africa for the first time, according to Finance Minister Mthuli Ncube.】

item.title: 特朗普寻求和平协议，墨丘利评估刚果钶钽铁矿
item.description: 如果特朗普政府能促成和平协议，Mercuria Energy Group Ltd. 公司将与一家美国支持的投资公司商讨在刚果战区开发一个珍贵的钽项目。【原文：Mercuria Energy Group Ltd. has held discussions with a US-backed investment company about developing a prized tantalum project in a Congolese war zone, if the Trump administration can broker a peace deal.】

item.title: 阿波罗与竞争对手一起收购马德里竞技队
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. has bought a majority stake in Atlético de Madrid, joining a growing number of private equity funds taking control of famous football teams.】

item.title: 萨科齐因卡扎菲阴谋入狱仅 20 天即获释
item.description: 法国前总统尼古拉-萨科齐（Nicolas Sarkozy）因涉嫌参与与利比亚已故领导人卡扎菲（Moammar Qaddafi）政权有关的选举资金阴谋而被判处五年监禁，在服刑仅 20 天后，他将从法国监狱的 "噩梦 "中获释。【原文：Former French President Nicolas Sarkozy will be released from his “nightmare” in a French jail just 20 days into a five-year sentence for his role in an alleged electoral funding conspiracy linked to the late Libyan leader Moammar Qaddafi’s regime.】

item.title: 离岸资产攀升，澳大利亚养老金提高外汇风险敞口
item.description: 澳大利亚的养老金巨头们正在增加货币风险，因为他们的离岸资产超过了所有投资的一半，对多元化的渴望超过了对美元避风港吸引力减弱的担忧。【原文：Australia’s pension giants are adding currency risk as their offshore assets surpass half of all investments, with desire for diversification outweighing fears the US dollar’s haven appeal is waning.】

item.title: 硅谷生物黑客迷恋的护肤品牌
item.description:
遍布 TikTok 的 OneSkin 将美容业对抗衰老的痴迷和科技界对阻止死亡的幻想融为一体。【原文：

OneSkin, all over TikTok, merges the beauty industry’s fixation with antiaging and tech’s fantasy of halting death.

】

item.title: 体育市场先知 X 寻求美国监管，以向全国扩张
item.description: ProphetX 正申请在美国全国范围内开展业务，在体育主题预测市场和博彩业的蓬勃发展中与竞争对手一较高下。【原文：ProphetX is applying to go nationwide in the US and take on its rivals in the booming industry for sports-themed prediction markets and wagering.】

item.title: 淡水河谷在铁价争夺战中开拓中国以外市场
item.description: 淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）正在转向新的市场，以实现铁矿石销售的多样化，因为该行业的最大客户中国正加大力度影响炼钢主原料的价格。【原文：Vale SA is turning to new markets to diversify iron ore sales as the industry’s top customer China steps up efforts to influence prices of the steelmaking staple.】

item.title: Veon 着眼于搭乘服务，在哈萨克斯坦与竞争对手一较高下
item.description: Veon Ltd. 计划在哈萨克斯坦拓展叫车和送货业务，力求在这个拥有 2,000 万人口的国家建立一个有助于提高数字服务收入的生态系统。【原文：Veon Ltd. plans to expand into ride-hailing and deliveries in Kazakhstan as it seeks to build an ecosystem in the nation of 20 million people that will help boost revenue from digital services.】

item.title: 随着西芒杜巨型铁矿即将投产，铁矿石大亨们纷纷前往几内亚
item.description: 即使起步蹒跚，几内亚的一个新矿仍将重塑全球铁矿石市场。【原文：Even with a stuttering start, a new mine in Guinea will reshape global iron ore markets.】

item.title: 泰森预计 2026 年业绩持平，牛肉价格仍创新高
item.description: 泰森食品公司（Tyson Foods Inc.【原文：Tyson Foods Inc. said it expects results for next year to be little changed, even as the Trump administration points to the meatpacking industry for record consumer beef prices.】

item.title: 前 Glencore 员工对非洲贿赂指控认罪
item.description: Glencore Plc 的四名前员工在伦敦表示不认罪，他们被指控犯有与该大宗商品贸易公司在西非赢得业务有关的贿赂罪。【原文：Four former Glencore Plc staffers charged with bribery offenses related to winning the commodity trading firm business in West Africa pleaded not guilty in London.】

item.title: 特朗普经济的三个 "A"：人工智能、资产价格和富裕阶层
item.description: 人工智能、富裕消费者和资产价格上涨支撑着特朗普的经济【原文：Trump’s economy is being propped up by AI, affluent consumers and asset price gains】

item.title: 卢克石油公司宣布伊拉克石油在制裁后不可抗力
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，俄罗斯卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）宣布，其位于伊拉克的巨型西古尔奈2号油田的石油运输遭遇不可抗力。【原文：Russia’s Lukoil PJSC declared force majeure on oil shipments from its giant West Qurna 2 field in Iraq, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美联储戴利敦促在讨论进一步降息时保持 "开放心态
item.description: 旧金山联储主席玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，美国经济可能正遭受需求下滑的影响，而与关税相关的通胀似乎暂时得到了遏制。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve President Mary Daly said the US economy is probably suffering a downturn in demand while tariff-related inflation appears to be contained for now.】

item.title: Instacart 在食品杂货订单节节攀升后前景看好
item.description: Instacart 公布的订单增长好于预期，并对当期盈利作出乐观展望，表明其核心杂货配送服务的需求一直保持强劲。【原文：Instacart posted better-than-expected order growth and provided an upbeat earnings outlook for the current period, indicating that demand for its core grocery delivery service has been holding strong.】

item.title: 使用聊天机器人的妄想症患者有自己的语言
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，埃伦-休特（Ellen Huet）和雷切尔-梅兹（Rachel Metz）将报道他们对人们在广泛使用聊天机器人期间出现错觉的报道进行调查后的发现。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ellen Huet and Rachel Metz report on their findings after an investigation into reports of people suffering from delusions during their extensive use of chatbots.】

item.title: 摩根大通的一通电话引发了三色集团的疯狂终结
item.description: 丹尼尔-朱（Daniel Chu）在意大利时，手机突然响了起来，这与他赖以发家致富的德克萨斯州闷热的停车场大相径庭。【原文：Daniel Chu was in Italy, a world away from the sweltering Texas car lots he had built his fortune on, when his phone lit up.】

item.title: 洛克希德和 Luckey 支持的核电初创公司融资 1.3 亿美元
item.description: Anduril Industries Inc.公司创始人帕尔默-卢基（Palmer Luckey）、洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin Corp.）、帕兰提尔科技公司（Palantir Technology Inc.【原文：Anduril Industries Inc. founder Palmer Luckey, Lockheed Martin Corp., Palantir Technology Inc.’s Shyam Sankar and other investors are putting $130 million into Valar Atomics, a nuclear startup that’s aiming to build thousands of advanced nuclear fission reactors within a decade.】

item.title: 菲尔-米克尔森炒作石油钻探商，为近海项目造势
item.description: 美国石油业目前最引人关注的企业大戏之一不是在二叠纪盆地或阿拉斯加的北坡上演，而是在加利福尼亚州的圣巴巴拉这个不可能的背景下上演，而且还有一位著名的职业高尔夫球手客串演出。【原文：One of the most compelling corporate dramas in the US oil industry right now isn’t playing out in the Permian Basin or Alaska’s North Slope but against the unlikely backdrop of tony Santa Barbara, California — with a walk-on part from a famous professional golfer.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税似乎已达到其经济和政治顶峰
item.description: 特朗普向最高法院提交的关税案看起来摇摆不定，民主党人正在打 "经济承受能力 "牌对付他【原文：Trump’s tariff case before the Supreme Court looks wobbly, and Democrats are playing the ‘affordability’ card against him】

item.title: 埃及加大黑海小麦采购力度
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，埃及新成立的小麦采购机构已从黑海地区预订了约 50 万吨小麦，将于 12 月和 1 月进口。【原文：Egypt’s new wheat-buying agency has booked about half a million tons of the grain from the Black Sea region for import in December and January, according to a person familiar with the matter.】
